title: RE60026: Reliability Management - Quick Facts
text:
RE60026
Course name | RELIABILITY MANAGEMENT
Offered by | Reliability Engineering Centre
Credits | 3
L-T-P | 3-0-0
Previous Year Grade Distribution
{{{grades}}}
Semester | {{{semester}}}

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Product reliability, time dependency, reliability considerations in production, concept of productivity, prevention of degradation inherent product reliability. Lot control piece parts, control of measurement and test equipment tools control, raw material control, failure reporting system, corrective action coordination, Data collection and control, Employee capability and attitude, Reliability specification and procurement, reliability apportionment program. Parts program, contracting for reliability, procurement functions, documentation, vendor rating control, types of acceptance testing, confidence testing, parts reliability, equipment and system acceptance, sampling and controls, time samples, cost and audit and survey, organizing for reliability, management Objective and organization, time phase planning, scheduling and implementation, typical reliability control organization, administrative organization, training, report for management, surveillance by customer, assurance program.
